storm_rail_intro.title: Storm Rail Mooring
storm_rail_intro.text: Wind-rail moorings straddle a canyon mouth, each rail humming with charged gusts. Aeol riggers trade gust scripts while Freehands couriers lash down cargo.

choices.text: Ride the wind-rail down to the Sky-Spliced Docks.
Follow the compass line back to the Startways Nexus.
Chart a supply glide toward the Saltglass Expanse.
(Storm-Conductor) Lash the charged winds into a drop toward the Cloud-Burrow threshold.

starts.title: Storm Rail Mooring
starts.blurb: Ride storm-rails across canyon gustways. Bold maneuvers and Aeol ties cut new lanes.
